page.title: 06A day in my life. 1985.
page.content: When I get up in the morning I wash and dress and after breakfast I go to school. School begins at 9.15.am. with Morning Assembly. We say prayers and sing hymns and read from the Bible. It is then time for classwork and we always begin with Maths. We have playtime at 10.35.am. and for the rest of the morning we are taught English and Welsh. Lunch time is from 12.15.pm. to 1.15.pm. In the afternoon we learn History, Geography and Science through Project Work. We also have Art,R.E.,Music,and P.E. I enjoy the afternoon lessons very much. In the evening I do my homework and then play with my friends. On wet evenings I watch television. (Hayley Simmonds. 10 years.)
